code: import PollTypes from"./pollTypes";export var REFRESH_POLL_DATA_ACTION=function REFRESH_POLL_DATA_ACTION(pollData){return{type:PollTypes.REFRESH_POLL_DATA,payload:pollData};};export var ADD_POLL_ACTION=function ADD_POLL_ACTION(newAnswer){return{type:PollTypes.ADD_POLL,payload:newAnswer};};export var RESET_POLL_ACTION=function RESET_POLL_ACTION(){return{type:PollTypes.RESET_POLL};};export var UPDATE_QUESTION_ACTION=function UPDATE_QUESTION_ACTION(question){return{type:PollTypes.UPDATE_QUESTION,payload:question};};export var UPDATE_SINGLE_ANSWER_ACTION=function UPDATE_SINGLE_ANSWER_ACTION(id,answer){return{type:PollTypes.UPDATE_SINGLE_ANSWER,payload:{id:id,answer:answer}};};export var REMOVE_AN_ANSWER_ACTION=function REMOVE_AN_ANSWER_ACTION(id){return{type:PollTypes.REMOVE_AN_ANSWER,payload:id};};export var SWITCH_ROLE_ACTION=function SWITCH_ROLE_ACTION(connected_role){return{type:PollTypes.SWITCH_ROLE,payload:connected_role};};export var VOTING_ACTION=function VOTING_ACTION(id){return{type:PollTypes.VOTING,payload:id};};
